Case# MPMoviePlaybackState.interrupted

iOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatediPadOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatedMac Catalyst 13.1–13.1Deprecated

```
case interrupted
```

Deprecated

Use AVPlayerViewController in AVKit

## [Discussion](/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMoviePlaybackState/interrupted#Discussion)

Playback is temporarily interrupted, perhaps because the buffer ran out of content.

## [See Also](/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMoviePlaybackState/interrupted#see-also)
